RetrievalSummaryDefField.name: RetrievalSummaryDefField
RetrievalSummaryDefField.description: Represents a table that stores the fields to retrieve from the target object of a rollup definition.

RetrievalSummaryDefOrObjectId.description: The related retrieval summary definition or node.

SequenceNumber.description: The order that the rollup definition shows in the setup UI and API result.
